languages.text: "Почему мы прячемся здесь, {name}? Направь меня сквозь пламя и мрак, и я развею их!"
"Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"
languages.original_text: "Почему мы прячемся здесь, {name}? Направь меня сквозь пламя и мрак, и я развею их!"

traits.locale_text: "Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me to walk through flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"
"Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me to walk through flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"
"Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"
"Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"
"Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"
"Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"
"Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"
"Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"

languages.text: "Warum verstecken wir uns hier, {name}? Führt mich durch die Flammen und die Dunkelheit, dann werde ich sie vertreiben!"
languages.original_text: "Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"

traits.locale_text: "Warum verstecken wir uns hier, {name}? Führt mich durch die Flammen und die Dunkelheit, dann werde ich sie vertreiben!"

languages.text: « Pourquoi nous cacher ici, {name} ? Dites-moi simplement où se trouvent les flammes et les ténèbres, et je me ferai un devoir de les bannir ! »
languages.original_text: "Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi nous cacher ici, {name} ? Dites-moi simplement où se trouvent les flammes et les ténèbres, et je me ferai un devoir de les bannir ! »

languages.text: «¿Por qué nos escondemos aquí, {name}? ¡Indíqueme dónde están las llamas y la oscuridad y las desterraré!».
languages.original_text: "Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué nos escondemos aquí, {name}? ¡Indíqueme dónde están las llamas y la oscuridad y las desterraré!».

languages.text: 「どうしてここに隠れているんですか、{name}？炎と暗闇の中で私を指してくだされば、連中を追い払ってみせます！」
languages.original_text: "Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"

traits.locale_text: 「どうしてここに隠れているんですか、{name}？炎と暗闇の中で私を指してくだされば、連中を追い払ってみせます！」

languages.text: “我们为什么要躲在这里，{name}？指引我穿越火焰和黑暗吧，让我驱逐他们！”
languages.original_text: "Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"

traits.locale_text: “我们为什么要躲在这里，{name}？指引我穿越火焰和黑暗吧，让我驱逐他们！”

languages.text: "Neden burada saklanıyoruz {name}? Alevlerle karanlığın içinden bana yol göster, ben de onları defedeyim!"
languages.original_text: "Why are we hiding in here, {name}? Point me through the flames and darkness, and I will banish them!"
